page.title: 04POPULATION OF LYTHE
page.content: POPULATION:- The population of Lythe consists of 42%males and 56%females.The total population being about 130. AGE DISTRIBUTION LENGTH OF TIME IN VILLAGE 0-5yrs. 4% 0-1yr. 7% 5-11yrs. 8% 1-5yrs. 9% 11-20yrs. 12% 5-10yrs 7% 20-30yrs. 8% 10-20yrs. 29% 30-40yrs. 16% 20-30yrs. 11% 40-50yrs. 9% 30-40yrs. 9% 50-60yrs. 14% 40-50yrs. 5% Over 60yrs,27% Over 50yrs16% From these figures we see that the village is populated largely by people who have spent most of their life in the village and who are now of middle age or over.
